items.sentence: I suspect Tom and Mary are planning to get married.
Tom has actually been doing that for some time now.
It may not be as easy to do as you think it\'ll be.
Tom certainly didn\'t say what you thought he said.
Tom suggested going to another supermarket instead.
Tom takes his teddy bear with him wherever he goes.
I\'m not to blame for everything that has happened.
I\'d never have met Tom if it hadn\'t been for you.
We only have enough time to do one of those things.
Tom knew Mary wasn\'t likely to be able to do that.
